SELECT A.RNUM , A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_NAME , A.EMP_NAME , A.NOTICE_CONTENT , A.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE , A.NOTICE_COUNT , D.EMP_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.NOTICE_NO , B.NOTICE_NAME , B.EMP_NAME , B.NOTICE_CONTENT , B.NOTICE_COUNT , B.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE FROM (SELECT C.NOTICE_NO , C.NOTICE_NAME , C.EMP_NAME , C.NOTICE_CONTENT , C.NOTICE_COUNT , C.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE FROM NOTICE C
LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE D ON(C.EMP_NAME = D.EMP_NAME)
D.EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
C.NOTICE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
C.NOTICE_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
ORDER BY C.NOTICE_NO DESC ) B
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{ endRow }
) A LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE D ON (A.EMP_NAME = D.EMP_NAME) WHERE A.RNUM >= #{ startRow } ORDER BY 1 ASC
